snippet: Shares of UnitedHealth Group and Best Buy were lower after the companies’ earnings reports. Shares of Square soared.
abstract: Stocks close slightly lower after fluctuating between slight gains and losses; health care stocks are among biggest decliners, dragged down by United Health Group's poor earnings forecast.
lead_paragraph: Shares of UnitedHealth Group and Best Buy were lower after the companies’ earnings reports. Shares of Square soared.

headline.main: Modest Loss for Market as Investors Assess Mixed Earnings
headline.print_headline: Uneven Earnings Reports Keep the Markets Wavering
